advancements.feywild.feywild.dwarf_contr: Purchase a contract from a Dwarf
A Start of a beautiful friendship
advancements.feywild.feywild.dwarf_trade: Traded with a Dwarf and I liked it!
Traded with a Dwarf in the Dwarven Market.
advancements.feywild.feywild.fey_altar.d: Obtain a fey altar to summon the Fey
advancements.feywild.feywild.fey_dust.de: All are of the dust, and all turn to dust again
Borrow the Feywild Lexicon from the Library
advancements.feywild.feywild.root.title: Welcome to the Feywild
advancements.feywild.feywild.schematics_: Purchase the fey gem transmutation schematics
advancements.feywild.feywild.summon_autu: Conjure a summoning scroll for a Autumn Pixie
advancements.feywild.feywild.summon_spri: Conjure a summoning scroll for a Spring Pixie
advancements.feywild.feywild.summon_summ: Conjure a summoning scroll for a Summer Pixie
Do I look like your pet?
advancements.feywild.feywild.summon_wint: Conjure a summoning scroll for a Winter Pixie
Maybe if you died we can be friends...
autumn_quest_pixie.feywild.summon_messag: Darling, what took you so long! I've been waiting for a fine specimen just like you!
block.feywild.display_glass: Display for the Golden Honey Comb
block.feywild.elven_spring_quartz_cracke: Cracked Elven Spring Quartz Brick Slab
Cracked Elven Spring Quartz Brick Stairs
block.feywild.elven_summer_quartz_cracke: Cracked Elven Summer Quartz Brick Slab
Cracked Elven Summer Quartz Brick Stairs
block.feywild.elven_autumn_quartz_cracke: Cracked Elven Autumn Quartz Brick Slab
Cracked Elven Autumn Quartz Brick Stairs
block.feywild.elven_winter_quartz_cracke: Cracked Elven Winter Quartz Brick Slab
Cracked Elven Winter Quartz Brick Stairs
dwarf.feywild.annoyed: <Dwarf> Why am I here? You want to trade? Sorry friend but I am not in the mood. I need to find a way to get back home.
dwarf.feywild.dialogue: <Dwarf> Beardless friend! Talking is cheap, but ores are priceless. So, let's trade!
dwarf.feywild.scroll: <Dwarf> Haha, I like your style. Tell me if you need anything.
dwarf.feywild.trade: <Dwarf> Haha, it's always great trading with you!
item.feywild.schematics_deadly_rune_craf: Schematic for Deadly Sins Rune Crafting
jei.trades.title: Trading
librarian.feywild.initial: Hello Stranger, welcome to the Feywild, the wonderful land of fey and magic. Ah! Looking for knowledge?
message.feywild.aligned: This fey court recognises you as one of it's own.
message.feywild.autumn_pixie.dissapear: As long as you are happy, darling...
message.feywild.autumn_pixie.follow: Going for a walk? I'd like to come with you!
message.feywild.autumn_pixie.stay: It feels so homely here. A good place to stay while you're away, darling.
message.feywild.spring_pixie.dissapear: Bah you are so boring! We could have been friends!
message.feywild.spring_pixie.follow: You'll take me with you on a adventure? This is going to be great!
message.feywild.spring_pixie.stay: What a beautiful place! I'll wait for you here! Oh What's that?
message.feywild.summer_pixie.dissapear: You made an enemy today, mortal!
message.feywild.summer_pixie.follow: You need me to accompany you? What sign of weakness.
message.feywild.summer_pixie.stay: Don't let me wait too long! Hmph!
message.feywild.winter_pixie.dissapear: Such inconvenience...We shall come for your soul.
message.feywild.winter_pixie.follow: Such inconvenience... Can't you go out on your own?
message.feywild.bee_knight.dissapear: You have put a bounty on yourself, mortal!
message.feywild.bee_knight.follow: You need me to accompany you? What sign of weakness.
message.feywild.bee_knight.stay: Don't let me wait too long! Hmph!
message.feywild.mandragora.dissapear: Why?...Who will take care of your garden now?
message.feywild.mandragora.follow: Let's find some plants for our garden!
message.feywild.mandragora.stay: You go on your adventure! I will take care of the garden.
message.feywild.autumn_fey_name: Thank you very much, Darling! I bet you would like to know my real name, don't you?
message.feywild.autumn_pixie: A summoning scroll for a Autumn Pixie
message.feywild.bee_knight: A summoning scroll for a Bee Knight. Requires an allegiance with the Summer Court
message.feywild.bee_knight_fail: You are unworthy of our respect, thread carefully.
message.feywild.bee_knight_pass: Hmm our queen said you can pass but I will keep my eyes on you.
message.feywild.bell.annoyed: I am here already, please be quiet!
message.feywild.dwarf_blacksmith: Use this scroll on a Dwarven Anvil to summon your Dwarven friend.
message.feywild.inactive_market_rune_sto: This seems to be crafted by the Dwarves. A Dwarf will know what to do with it.
message.feywild.mandragora: A summoning scroll for a Mandragora, requires an allegiance with the Spring Court.
message.feywild.mandrake_potion: Drinking this potion will make you forget your allegiance.
message.feywild.market_closed:
Hello dear customer, 
We are sorry for the inconvenience but the market is temporarily closed, please come back later! 
-Market Place Management
message.feywild.market_rune_stone: This item is used as a method of traveling to the dwarf market.
message.feywild.teleportation_orb: This item is used as a method of traveling to the feywild.
message.feywild.pixie_orb: You captured a pixie inside an eye of Ender. Bring it to your pixie to trade for a teleportation Orb or free the pixie captured inside however they will have lost most of their magic.
message.feywild.market_wrong_source:
Hello dear customer, 
We are sorry for the inconvenience but we can't bring you here from that dimension you're in. 
-Market Place Management
message.feywild.feywild_wrong_source: You seem to bee to far away to go to the Feywild. Consider travelling to the overworld.
message.feywild.music_disc_feywild: Music composed, mixed and mastered by: Davy Habets (IKIGA) - www.ikigamusic.com
message.feywild.music_disc_feywild_2: Song of the Seasons Composed, mixed and mastered by: Davy Habets (IKIGA)
message.feywild.schematics_deadly_rune_c: When Botania is installed this book can be used to craft Runes with the Dwarven anvil. This version also includes all the elemental and seasonal runes.
message.feywild.schematics_elemental_run: When Botania is installed this book can be used to craft Runes with the Dwarven anvil more efficiently.
message.feywild.schematics_seasonal_rune: When Botania is installed this book can be used to craft Runes with the Dwarven anvil more efficiently. This version also includes all the elemental runes.
message.feywild.schematics_yggdrasil_run: When Mythic Botany is installed this book can be used to craft Runes with the Dwarven anvil. This version also includes all the elemental, seasonal and deadly sins Runes.
message.feywild.shroomling: A summoning scroll for a Shroomling, requires an allegiance with the Autumn Court.
message.feywild.spring_fey_name: Oh! Can I give you a nickname too? My real name is a secret thou! I will never tell! Ever!
message.feywild.spring_fey_thanks: Oh, for me? Thank you so much, human.
message.feywild.spring_pixie: A summoning scroll for a Spring Pixie
message.feywild.summer_fey_name: How dare you give me a nickname like I am some sort of magician's pet! I'll never tell you my real name! Hmph!
message.feywild.summer_pixie: A summoning scroll for a Summer Pixie
message.feywild.summon_fail: The scroll shimmers shortly...but then it fades away. You are lacking the correct conditions.
message.feywild.summon_cookie_fail: The Mandrake looks at you with disgust....It's not going to accept anything from you. You are lacking the correct conditions
message.feywild.summoning_scroll: Used in summoning rituals but can also be used to recapture a summoned Fey.
message.feywild.winter_fey_name: A nickname? Such inconvenience....I can't even remember my real name.
message.feywild.winter_pixie: A summoning scroll for a Winter Pixie
message.feywild.boss: Beware: This scroll holds powerful magic. Summoning a arch fey might be deadly to whom ever uses this scroll.
minemention.feywild.faction.description: Mention everyone from your Feywild faction.
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_01.complete.d: Thank you darling! You are so adorable, no need to be nervous.$(n)I think I will feel right at home with you.$(n)As they say $(autumn)'Home is where the heart is!'$() - The pixie winks at you -$(n)$(n)Just relax. Let's make this place a nice and comfy home!$(n)
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_01.start.desc: Oh my, an adventurer?$(n)- The pixies looks at you from top to bottom, you feel like she is gazing into your soul-$(n)I see...$(n)$(n)You won't need that sword while I'm around, well...maybe as a cooking knife.$(n)So why don't you $(autumn)gift$() that $(autumn)iron sword$() to me?$(n)- The pixie holds out her hands, and you feel tempted to give up your adventurers days and stay in her warm embrace -$(n)Aaw, don't worry. I'll protect you from now on!$(n)
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_02.complete.d: Wonderful!$(n)$(n)And you got that so fast! 'A good cook is defined by his tools, you know!'$(n)Look at that! We're all prepared! Maybe i can get you one of those cute aprons! Let me cook our first meal, sweetie. You rest! You worked so hard!$(n)
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_02.start.desc: Every home needs good home cooked meals!$(n)So let's make some preparations shall we?$(n)Can't receive guests if you can't prepare a proper meal.$(n)First we need to $(autumn)craft$() a $(autumn)smoker$() and a $(autumn)cauldron$(), don't you agree Darling?
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_03.complete.d: Aaw it's adorable!$(n)Hey dog! You better keep my darling save!$(n)Maybe we can make him a small doggie pen?$(n)I'll leave the decorations to you!$(n)
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_03.start.desc: Isn't our home coming along nice!$(n)I wish you wouldn't go on your adventures alone.$(n)If you bring me along I will always protect you.$(n)But our home also needs a cute pet. How about a dog?$(n)They are very loyal creatures, you know!$(n)
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_04.complete.d: That's a lovely name!$(n)You would like to know my name too? $(n)I can be anything you like, darling.$(n)Where I'm from, knowing someone's name is like having power of that being.$(n)You gave me your name?$(n)- The pixie smiles at you-$(n)Yes. Yes you did.$(n)
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_04.start.desc: Poor dog, he seems famished!$(n)You should take good care of 'dog' or the $(winter)Winter Court$() will claim him.$(n)Maybe you can $(autumn)cook$() him some dog food?"$(n)I think they like $(autumn)cooked beef$().$(n)$(n)Dog! Doggie! Come here!$(n)Darling made you some food!$(n)Aww look he likes it!$(n)...We can't keep calling him 'dog' he needs a $(autumn)proper name$()!$(n)Don't worry, you will never know his real name! So it's fine!$(n)
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_05.complete.d: Oh wauw...It's almost like my home, the Eternal Falls.$(n)The Eternal Falls is the home of the Autumn Courts.$(n)Yes of course! Each season has it's own court!$(n)Why do you think the seasons change here? It's because the fey fight over the dominion of the feywild!
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_05.start.desc: How are you today, darling?$(n)You want to do something for me, to make me feel more at home?$(n)Aren't you the sweetest.$(n)Let me think! No all I need is right here!$(n)But if you would like you can $(autumn)grow$() some $(autumn)autumn tree saplings$() from my homeland.
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_06.complete.d: The $(autumn)Autumn Court$() is not concerned with the power struggle of the other Courts.$(n)We care more about a good home and preparing for when winter is coming.$(n)Or giving those who are close to death a nice passing and good memories, before leaving them to the $(winter)cold slumber of Winter$()...$(n)$(n)Unlike the other fairy courts, the $(b;autumn)Autumn court$() is an empty throne ruled by none.$(n)We do however have a $(b;spring)sovereign$(), the $(b;autumn)Blight Lord$().$(n)The oldest of the Tree Ents.$(n)We honor him since no autumn fey is foolish enough to take on the mantle of Autumn Ruler.
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_06.start.desc: You would like to know more about the seasonal Courts?$(n)There is no need to visit a library!$(n)As an Autumn Pixie I have alot of wisdom, I can tell you all about the Seasonal Courts.$(n)You may want to grab a book and quill to write all of this down!$(n)
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_07.complete.d: Spring represents $(spring)new beginnings$(), a rebirth even.$(n)That's why most of the Spring fey are a depiction of innocence and youthfulness.$(n)$(n)Spring is also the season of fertility where in desires run rampart,and inhibition or restraint is considered an insult.$(n)What do you say, would you like to stay a bit longer?...Aww don't blush!
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_07.start.desc: The Ruler of the $(spring)Spring Court$() is $(spring)Prince Oberon$(),a young and charismatic fey.$(n)He and $(summer)Queen Titania$() are lovers for a reason you know.$(n) -The pixie winks at you -$(n)$(n)I'm still to deliver an offering of dyes to the Blight Lord.To colour the trees ofcourse!$(n)We could $(spring)visit$() the $(spring)Blossoming Wealds$().$(n)It's a wonderfull sea of colours!$(n)Would you be a sweetie and gather a variety of flowers when we arrive there?
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_08.complete.d: Those are some nice colors! You've got good taste!$(n)$(n)We can stay a bit longer, and enjoy the sunset as the day ends.$(n)The Autumn forest is lovely at night, lights and colours guide lost souls to our home.$(n)$(n)As a lost adventurer I think you would like to visit the Summer and Winter court too?$(n)I guessed as much... I can't stop those adventurer's impulses, can I?$(n)- The pixie laughs sadly-$(n)But I must warn you the other Courts arent as welcoming, as Spring and Autumn.$(n)And there is another reason...$(n)$(n)I...uhm... kinda stole you away from both the Winter and Summer Court.$(n)They would both have claimed you as their own...and they would have send you to your inevitable end.$(n)I may not be able to stop you from going on adventures,but at least I can give you some nice memories, a good home and good company...
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_08.start.desc: Can you $(spring)craft$() a colour pallet of $(autumn)dyes$()so they can start painting the trees in Autumn colours.$(n)You can just gift them to me darling and we can deliver them toegether.$(n)$(n)Autumn is the season of changes, much like Spring embraces beginnings, autumn welcomes endings.$(n)We make sure everybody has a good time and is well prepared for when winter comes!$(n)The end may be scary, that's why most mortals fear us Autumn Fey.$(n)But as you will see, darling. There is beauty near the end.
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_09.complete.d: As expected $(b;summer)Queen Titania$() didn't accept our gift or our presence...recent events haven't favoured our arrival either.$(n)The $(summer)Summer Court$() has been robbed of the $(spring)Elytra$(),the mantle of the Seelie Court.$(n)They demand you retrieve it, as it was your destiny!$(n)I told them I hold your destiny in my hands and it's up to you if you want to fulfil it or not...
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_09.start.desc: $(summer)Summer$() is often associated with potentials, renewals and opportunities.$(n)However they see themselves as the peak of the seasons, the strongest and ever lasting.$(n)They are lost in their passions and desire for power.$(n)As the summer they can be warm and protecting, but also dominant and destructive.$(n)There is a reason they are often compared with fire.$(n)Both pleasant and terrifying...$(n)$(n)"$(summer)Titania$() holds the title of the $(spring)Fairy Queen$(), thou a self proclaimed title.Claimed after a everlasting war between light and darkness.$(n)Though intimidating I know Queen Titania likes to indulge herself,so some $(autumn)Cookies$() would be a perfect $(b;spring)gift$(), for the leader of the Golden Court. Don't you agree, darling?
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_10.complete.d: Ow darling...you couldn't resist going on another adventure.Why did you have to come here?$(n)$(winter)Queen Mab$() will send her reapers after us.$(n)Their objective is the same as the $(b;summer)Summer Court$(), retrieve the $(spring)Elytra$() and claim it as their own.$(n)Either way....new Seasonal wars will start, a battle over dominance.$(n)Let's go home. Dog is waiting for us! I'll make you some hot cocoa!
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_10.start.desc: Why don't we stay at home and postpone our visit to the $(winter)Winter Court$()?
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_11.complete.d: You found it! You found it....$(n)It's up to you wich Court you will grand the mantle to.$(n)No darling, I won't take it. I have no desire for such power.$(n)Let's go home one last time? Please...$(n)$(n)$(spring)-You and your pixie friend return to the warmth of your home.-$()$(n)$(n)$(autumn)-An assassin of either the winter or summer court came that night. The Autumn pixies embraces you with the touch of the fey.$(n)You accept her embrace, its warm and comfortable...your last breath leaves your body.$(n)You become one of the fey and leave your adventurous life behind.$(n)It was good and full of memories.$(n)'Don't worry' the fey says 'your dog friend will be there too, he tried to protect you...loyal till the end!-$()
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_11.start.desc: I realise now I can't stop you from going adventuring...$(n)I hoped the allure of home cooked meals would keep you safe, here with me...but I was wrong$(n)If you want to go...and $(spring)find$() the$(spring)Elytra$()...you can,just know I will be there to support you...$(n)$(n)$(autumn)END OF CHAPTER 2$()
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_12.complete.d: If you ever loose the teleportation orb. Come to me again with an Pixie Orb.
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_12.start.desc: If you want to go to the Feywild, I know of a way. But it requires some dark magic. $(n)$(autumn)Obtain an eye of ender and trap a fey inside it$(). The orb will subtract all the magic from the captured fey , reducing it to a mere pixie.$(n)I can use my own magic to emplify the eye's teleportation magic and bind it to the Feywild.
quest.feywild.autumn.root.start.descript: Darling, what took you so long! I've been waiting for a fine specimen$(n)just like you. Would you care to tell me your name darling?$(n)$(n)$(b;autumn)Accepting this quest will bind you to the Autumn Court!$()
quest.feywild.autumn.root.start.title: Welcome to the Autumn court
quest.feywild.spring.root.start.descript: Where Am I? Who are you? Are you tasty?$(n)Let's go on an adventure!$(n)You wanna play? I'm hungry.. $(n)What's your name?$(n)$(n)$(spring)Accepting this quest will bind you to the Spring Court!$()
quest.feywild.spring.root.start.title: Welcome to the Spring court
quest.feywild.spring.quest_04.complete.d: What is that smell? What are you making?$(n)The cake for $(spring)Prince Oberon$()?$(n)No, no, no, this treasure is mine...$(n)Lets quickly eat it before $(spring)Prince Oberon$() finds out!$(n)$(i)- The tiny pixie plunges her face inside of the cake - $()$(n)Phew, I'm stuffed. I think I might explode. Huff puff.....got more?
quest.feywild.spring.quest_04.start.desc: You would like to know more about the different Courts?$(n)Well you choose the best Court, we're by far the most fun!$(n) Nothing like those arrogant Fey of the $(summer)Summer Court$(), they think they rule the Fey world.$(n) The $(winter)Winter Court$() is just scary...$(n)-the little pixie shivers-$(n) Which reminds me! Now that you bound your soul to the Spring Court we should make an offering to $(spring)Prince Oberon$()! $(n) Maybe you can make some of those delicious human-made (2) $(spring)cakes$() and $(spring)give$() them to me?
quest.feywild.spring.quest_06.start.desc: $(n)You still would like to know more about the other Courts? But I told you everything, we're awesome and fun and the others are boring! $(n)We could go to the Feywild and visit the other Courts! But... I don't know how adventurers can cross the veil and enter our lands. $(n)We could $(spring)visit$() a $(spring)library$()? $(n)-You try to explain to the little pixie what a library is- $(n) Sounds boring...$(n)There are books about food? Count me in!
quest.feywild.spring.quest_07.complete.d: Ooops! Are you ok adventurer? $(n)- The little pixie can't stop laughing - $(n)Did you see how angry he got! His face was all red!
quest.feywild.spring.quest_07.start.desc: What!? Every time you ring that bell the Librarian will be summoned to this location! That's so funny! You should $(b;spring)ring$() it!$(n)I dare you! $(n)Again! Do it Again! $(n)– The little pixie wipes a way a tear of laughter - $(n)$(n)$(autumn)Please be aware that ringing the bell multiple times, the librarian will call security. You have been warned!$()
quest.feywild.spring.quest_08.complete.d: I think we better go! The librarian seems very upset with us. We made a mess of his books, asked all kinds of questions, and did you have to ring that bell so often?$(n) Ow, I took this book! I really like it! Look at all the weird animals!
quest.feywild.spring.quest_08.start.desc: Did you find any $(spring)information$() yet?$(n)Meh! I'm so bored! aren't there any fun picture books here?$(n)- The pixie starts digging through a pile of books -$(n)'$(b;spring)Botania$()'...flowers!...Looks complex...'$(b;summer)Create$()'....create what? Oh! This one has pictures of all kinds of animals!$(n)- The little pixie happily starts looking into the book-
quest.feywild.spring.quest_09.complete.d: - After petting the Llama, the little pixie wipes her face-$(n)That's their way of saying they like me? It depends on their tone?$(n)Ok!$(n)- The pixie spits you in your face-$(n)Aaaah~ why are you angry!? Was it the wrong tone?$(n)$(n)The book says people drape them with different kinds of colour carpets.$(n)We should collect one with every colour drape!$(n)Let's do that! After we petted more animals.
quest.feywild.spring.quest_09.complete.t: A way of saying thank you
quest.feywild.spring.quest_09.start.desc: I want to $(spring)pet$() every animal that is in this book!$(n) Like for real!$(n)What? Petting all the animals in the world would take to long?$(n)- The little pixie pouts -$(n)Fine! Let's see... I've already seen most of the barn animals, cows, chickens, pigs and our flying friends the sheep.$(n)A horse...no a donkey...ow this one looks funny. A La..Lama!$(spring)Llama$()? Lalalama~~!
quest.feywild.spring.quest_10.complete.d: Can I keep one?$(n)They won't mind if we obduct one, there are plenty.$(n)We can make it a nice one by one pen, teach it a job!$(n)They will be so happy.
quest.feywild.spring.quest_10.start.desc: $(i)Cat's live near villages, villagers often own a cat to repel creepers$().$(n)Oh we should go $(b;spring)pet$() one! Look at its cute noose.$(n)Not the cat, the $(b;spring)villager$()! You're so silly...$(n)It looks adorable!$(n)- The pixie hugs the book with the image in it -$(n)
quest.feywild.spring.quest_11.complete.d: - The pixie has a disappointed look -$(n)There was no treasure at all...$(n)$(n)You squashed one of the eggs didn't you?...then what is that on your boots?
quest.feywild.spring.quest_11.start.desc: A turtle! Why do they have a shell? What are they hiding in there?$(n)Treasures!?$(n)Oooh we're gonna be rich!$(n)You pet one, and I'll take it's treasure!
quest.feywild.spring.quest_12.complete.d: - When approuching the frogs, the little pixie was pulled in by the frog's tongue -$(n)Phew...Thanks for saving me! So not cute!$(n)Do I look like a firefly to you?$(n)...$(n)- The pixie turns away from you angrily -$(n)$(n)Oh Ssst! Listen!...They're making a funny sounds. Its like music.$(n)-You and the pixie listen to the beautiful croaking concert-
quest.feywild.spring.quest_12.start.desc: We should try find one of these $(b;spring)frogs$()!$(n)-The pixie holds the book to your face so you can see the image -$(n)Slimy yet cute!$(n)
quest.feywild.spring.quest_13.complete.d: - After a wild chase you where able to pet one of the foxes -$(n)Huff...Puff...Ok the Autumn Pixies where right! They are very tricky.$(n)When we ever visit the Eternal Fall we should try again.$(n)High five adventurer!$(n)- The pixie raises her hand, but then drops it in exhuastion and tries to capture her breath -$(n)What do you mean I have wings? Flying is exuasting too!$(n)
quest.feywild.spring.quest_13.start.desc: These look like some of the creatures we have in the feywild too.$(n)A Fox! I always wanted to pet one, but the Autumn Pixies would never let me near one.$(n)They warned me that some can change shape and are cunning tricksters!$(n)Saying they are to 'dangerous' and they don't want to deal with retrieving my soul.$(n)As if I had one!
quest.feywild.spring.quest_14.complete.d: Why are you still upset I lied to you? We had fun didn't we!$(n)And now our sheep friends will be able to play with us forever on the Blossoming Wealds.$(n)$(n)Look at those dandelions aren't they fluffy!$(n)Yes, they are huge! Or you just became smaller....hehe.
quest.feywild.spring.quest_14.start.desc: We should $(spring)visit$() our Court first!$(n)$(n)The $(pring)Blossoming Wealds$() are so pretty, so many flowers and creatures!$(n)Let's go! I'll introduce you to my favorite sheep friends?$(n)Hmm?...ow...I knew what a sheep was!$(n)I just wanted to see if you would make it fly and let it die!$(n)And you did, so I knew we would be bestest friends!
quest.feywild.spring.quest_15.complete.d: Huff...puff...you cheated! Hmph!$(n)-You forget the time and play with the Pixie all through the night. Was it just one night? Or two? Or more...-
quest.feywild.spring.quest_15.start.desc: Let's do a race, see who can $(spring)pop$() the $(spring)Dandelion fluff$() the quickest!$(n)Loser has to play with the other all night long!$(n)Ready! Set! Hey....no fair!
quest.feywild.spring.quest_16.complete.d: I hope you didn't kill those $(summer)Bee Knights$() or we might get in trouble with $(summer)Queen Titania$().$(n)Oh the Honey! Sweet! All mine now!$(n)No no no! It's for $(b;spring)Prince Oberon$(). I'll make sure he will receive our offering!$(n)$(n)- When the pixie returns you notice she has some honey on her cheeks - $(n)Well...We are wanted Honey Thieves now!$(n)
quest.feywild.spring.quest_16.start.desc: Now that we are in the Feywild we should definitely get an offering for Prince Oberon, or he might get upset!$(n)I still can't believe you ate both cakes!$(n)I know! We should steal some of that delicious golden $(summer)magical honeycomb$() from the $(summer)Summer Court$()!$(n) But bee-carefull -the pixie giggles- for those $(b;summer)Bee Knights$() patrolling the area! Don't get stung!$(n)
quest.feywild.spring.quest_17.complete.d: When you arrive at the Eternal Falls you are greeted by the Autumn Pixies and a friendly Shroomling.$(n)"$(spring)-You enjoy your time with the Pixie in the Autumn Court. It feels like days of chasing Shroomlings, dancing in the rain and running through leaves.$(n)-$(autumn)-As you about to forget time and everything that once was important, you remember...All good things must come to an end-$()$(n)$(n)-The pixie notices the change in your demeanor-$(n)Bored are you? Maybe it is time we move on! $(spring)Let's go see the Winter Fey$()!
quest.feywild.spring.quest_17.start.desc: The $(autumn)Autumn Court$() can be really fun!$(n)You can fly though all the coloured leaves! Play in the rain! Play tag with Shroomlings!$(n)Ow...and they have delicious mushroom stew!$(n)Let's $(spring)find$() one of their forests.$(n)$(n)If we plan on visiting the $(autumn)Autumn Court$() we should prepare a home cooked meal! They are very keen on those traditions!$(n)So can you cook? We should make something special....Something they never had...something typically human!$(n)A $(spring)Hamburger$()?$(n)That sounds weird? Are you sure it will do?$(n)You know how to $(spring)craft$() the best Hamburger in the Feywild?$(n)Im convinced! I want one too!!$(n)$(n)Now we can savely visit the Autumn Court!$(n)$(n)Objective: obtain cooked beef, and bread. Visit the Autumn Court.
quest.feywild.spring.quest_18.complete.d: - The Winter pixies keep the souls of the dead at bay, while you make snow fairies and have another snow fight. The snowman you build is granted a soul and you could have played with him forever. Did you? As you stay longer in the Frozen Retreat, you feel something pulling on your soul. Destiny? A purpose? What is the shadow court? Shouldn't you do something about it? You once knew it was you who was meant to be... a hero? But this is so much fun! Yet...You stop -$(n)You would like to know more about the shadow Court?$(n)Go back to the $(spring)library $() and see if the librarian knows anything about them?$(n)But why? Aren't you having fun? Don't you want to play with me forever?$(n)$(n)$(spring)END OF CHAPTER 2$()
quest.feywild.spring.quest_18.start.desc: Something seems to be amiss.$(n)The  $(winter)Winter Fey $() are restless, let me find out whats going on.$(n)- The little pixie vanishes and comes back after a short while -$(n)Oh no...something terrible has happened!$(n)The $(summer)Electra $() has been stolen from the  $(summer)Summer Court $()!$(n)It's a Ceremonial Item representing the dominant Court, the  $(summer)Summer Court $() have been in possession of it for...$(n)- the pixie thinks deeply – A very long time!$(n)An  $(winter)Enderman $() of the  $(winter)Shadow Court $() stole it!$(n)I thought the shadow court was a fairy tale. Made up to scare misbehaving spring Pixies!$(n)They are real? That's so scary! - The pixie shivers -$(n)The  $(summer)Summer Court $() will put everything to get it back, but I bet you the $(winter)Winter Court $() will want to have the Electra for their own!$(n)$(n)-You are hit by a tiny snowball - Hehe, stop being so serious!$(n)Who care about the troubles of the $(winter)Winter$() and $(summer)Summer$() Court!$(n)W-what!? If I keep playing a $(winter)enderman$() will come get me? That's not funny! Hmph!$(n)Before we go can we at least $(spring)make$() a $(winter)snowman$()!$(n)'Do you want to...' - You hit the pixie with a snowball before she can utter that sentence-
quest.feywild.spring.quest_19.complete.d: We found an Elytra! We are going to be so rich!!$(n)$(n)I had so much fun with you adventurer! Did you have fun with me too? You did! I'm so happy!$(n)$(autumn)I could play with you forever!$()$(n)$(n)$(spring)-You and your pixie friend return home, loaded with treasures you found at the End Castle.$(n)You wonder why the pixie said those words in the way she did...'play with you forever'...You think nothing of it and go to sleep.-$()$(n)$(n)$(autumn)-The little pixie comes to you that night and whispers in your ear.$(n)Her name...no mortal should ever hear her name!$(n)You forget worries, and embrace the touch of the Fey...a gift from your friend.$(n)You become one of the fey and join their Realm to forever play on the Blossoming Wealds as the last breath leaves your body.-$()$(n)$(n)You had the best time ever!-
quest.feywild.spring.quest_19.start.desc: - The Winter pixies keep the souls of the dead at bay, while you make snow fairies and have another snow fight. The snowman you build is granted a soul and you could have played with him forever. Did you? As you stay longer in the Frozen Retreat, you feel something pulling on your soul. Destiny? A purpose? What is the shadow court? Shouldn't you do something about it? You once knew it was you who was meant to be... a hero? But this is so much fun! Yet...You stop -$(n)You would like to know more about the shadow Court?$(n)Go back to the $(spring)library $() and see if the librarian knows anything about them?$(n)But why? Aren't you having fun? Don't you want to play with me forever?$(n)$(n)$(spring)END OF CHAPTER 2$()
quest.feywild.spring.quest_20.complete.d: If you ever loose the teleportation orb. Come to me again with an Pixie Orb.
quest.feywild.spring.quest_20.start.desc: If you want to go to the Feywild, I know of a way. But it requires some dark magic. $(n)$(spring)Obtain an eye of ender and trap a fey inside it$(). The orb will subtract all the magic from the captured fey , reducing it to a mere pixie.$(n)I can use my own magic to emplify the eye's teleportation magic and bind it to the Feywild.
quest.feywild.spring.quest_01.complete.d: Finally!$(n)....It's a bit empty! $(n)Let's go!$(n)- The tiny pixie pushes you fowards. - $(n)Let's go already! We need to fill it with loads and loads of treasure!
quest.feywild.spring.quest_01.start.desc: I can't believe I found an adventurer! $(n)We're going to be the bestest of bestiest friends! $(n)$(n)Now I can go on an adventure too!$(n)Explore the world, taste new colours, meet weird creatures, try out new kinds of food!$(n)Oh...the Food! I can't wait!$(n)$(n)Let's go! Let's go already!$(n)But wait! You will need to $(spring)craft$() a $(spring)chest$() to store all our treasures!
quest.feywild.spring.quest_02.complete.d: What is that? A cloud! No wait, cotton candy!$(n)It doesn't taste very sweet...$(n)Hmm! A $(autumn)sheep$() you say? It's so fluffy!$(n)
quest.feywild.spring.quest_02.start.desc: Oh, you need a place to sleep during our adventures? $(n)You need (3)$(spring)wool$() for a bed? $(n)But we can sleep where ever we want... $(n)Look at all the space around you! Silly mortal needs! $(n)- the pixie giggles - $(n)$(n)Let's stargaze tonight! Maybe we see a shooting-star!
quest.feywild.spring.quest_03.complete.d: You made him fly! He must have been so happy! $(n)Wish we had taught it how to land....it's broken now... $(n)Luckily I was able to capture the spirits of all the sheep you so brutally murdered before they where taken by the $(winter)Winter Court$()! $(n)Now we can play with our fluffy friends from the sky, when ever we want!
quest.feywild.spring.quest_03.start.desc: It must be lonely thou without his friends,$(n)who are all the way in the sky!$(n)It cannot fly!? Flying is the best thing there is!$(n)Let's make it $(spring)fly$()! We must $(spring)find a way$()!$(n)Ow! I know! Let's use some fey dust on him!$(n)I'm so smart, hehe!
quest.feywild.spring.quest_03.start.titl: A little bit of pixie dust!
quest.feywild.spring.quest_05.complete.d: Wow! That looks amazing! You are the best! - The little pixie hugs you - $(n)Thanks for being my friend! $(n)$(n)$(spring)-End of Chapter 1-
quest.feywild.spring.quest_05.start.desc: I can't believe you ate both cakes! Now we don't have an offering for $(spring)Prince Oberon$().$(n)Maybe if we $(spring)grow$() some $(spring)spring tree saplings$(), $(spring)Prince Oberon$() will be pleased. $(n)It will also make me feel more at home!
quest.feywild.summer.quest_01.complete.d: Ow...It's you again?...Let me look at you!$(n)–  The pixie looks at you from top to bottom with a less disdainful look and you can detect a small smile –$(n)Turn around...once more....again!$(n)- The pixie giggles - $(n)I guess it's an improvement.$(n)You are worthy of my insults now!$(n)
quest.feywild.summer.quest_01.start.desc: Just my luck I end up with someone like you...$(n)-The pixie looks at you from top to bottom with a disdainful look– $(n)Not much muscle...thou that might be normal for it's kind....$(n)And it's look....might not be the brightest...eek!$(n)Stop gasping! Im not insulting you Im assessing you!$(n)There is a difference!$(n)$(n)If you want to be part of the $(b;summer)Golden Seelie Court$(), you better look the part.$(n)I can't present you as my champion before $(b;summer)Queen Titania$() when you look like this. $(n)$(n)Obtain yourself a human size $(b;summer)golden chestplate and helmet$()!$(n)Don't look at me like that! I'm not paying for it!$(n)Go on. Present yourself to me when you are properly attired.$(n)$(n)The audacity... - the Pixies roles her eyes-$(n)
quest.feywild.summer.quest_02.complete.d: What a battle! I had a few good laughs with your struggles but you pulled through in the end!$(n)Which is something.$(n)Not much, but something. Ah so funny! Ahum...$(n)What? You expected a reward? Your reward is being in my presence of course!$(n)$(n)A reward...the audacity!$(n) You can have the scraps I guess...
quest.feywild.summer.quest_02.start.desc: Before we seek an audience with $(b;summer)Queen Titania$(), you will have to prove your worth to me!$(n)Hmm...So a trial of combat! You will fight....$(n)- The Pixie thinks deeply about what mortally wounding task she will give you -$(n)...a Zombie! Yes an $(b;spring)Zombie Brute$()!$(n)If you survive, I will deem you worthy to be in my presence.$(n)If you survive....-the pixie giggles-...uh...cough cough...off you go!
quest.feywild.summer.quest_03.complete.d: That was amazing! Are you ok? I mean! Hope those stingers didn't hurt to much?$(n)Or is that your normal face?$(n)If that's the case, maybe you where better off getting stung...$(n)$(n)These will be perfect offerings for our Queen, $(summer)Titania$().$(n)We're always in need of Bee steeds for our Knights.
quest.feywild.summer.quest_03.start.desc: So you have some skill with a sword...that's nice and all, but do you have wits!$(n)To prove you worthy of being my servant and protector, you should...$(n)$(b;spring)gift$() me....a $(b;summer)bee's nest$()! Preferably with the bees still inside! Yes!$(n)We require more buzzing steeds for our cavalry... $(n)The Queen will be pleased with my offering! $(n)Be it the bees or your mortal's corpse....-the pixie giggles- uh cough cough!$(n)Ow you still here! Now hop along and don't get stung!
quest.feywild.summer.quest_04.complete.d: You actually did it!! -the Pixie restrains herself from embracing you-$(n)Ahum! You did an admirable job, and I hope you will continue to slaughter my enemies! My very own champion! $(n)– The pixie seems pleased and circles happily around you–$(n)$(n)$(summer)- Queen Titania is pleased with your offerings and victory for the Golden Seelie Court, as their new champion you are presented with a special reward -$()
quest.feywild.summer.quest_04.start.desc: Maybe you are not so useless after all! $(n)The $(summer)Summer Court$() is constantly under attack by a group of human raiders, who hunt down our kind to grind us into $(winter)dust$(),$(n)or steel our $(b;summer)sacred honey$()!$(n)We, and by we I mean you of course, should $(autumn)take down$() those $(spring)pillagers$()!$(n)Then, with you as my champion we can share our victory with the Queen, and I will be forever in her favour!! -the pixie is pleased with her own genius plan- $(n)Perfect! So...why are you still standing here? Go! Now!
quest.feywild.summer.quest_05.complete.d: We make a pretty good team you and I.$(n)Thanks for being my champion.$(n)What!? You'd rather be my friends!$(n)- The pixie blushes -$(n)Seems You still don't know your place?$(n)Though...I wouldn't mind....$(n)$(n)$(summer)-End of Chapter 1-$()
quest.feywild.summer.quest_05.start.desc: Ah! My Champion!$(n)- The pixie appears to be in a good mood today -$(n)Of course I'm in a good mood? I'm not normally?$(n)I'm just pleased with my accomplishments of late!$(n)Yes! You had some part in that as well.$(n)You leave me no choice but to settle here with you.$(n)Now $(summer)grow$() some $(summer)summer tree saplings$() so I feel more at home ! Hmph…$(n)- The pixie smiles happily -
quest.feywild.summer.quest_06.complete.d: Due to our latest victory and offering we where selected as one of the few to go on a mission to retrieve the $(summer)Elytra$().$(n)We are not to return without it, or punishment awaits us!$(n)Hope my faith in you was just! Let's look for information about the Shadow Court!
quest.feywild.summer.quest_06.start.desc: Champion! Something awful has happened.$(n)The $(winter)Shadow Court$() has returned and their $(winter)Enderman$() have stolen the $(bsummer)Elytra$()$(n)Why you looking so confused at me?$(n)Ow right....hmm where to begin!$(n)The Elytra is the property of the $(b;summer)Golden Seelie Court$(), cause it can only be owned by the strongest court!$(n)...right....the Shadow Court....$(n)uhm......maybe we should $(spring)find$() a $(spring)Librarian$() who can give us access to ancient books.
quest.feywild.summer.quest_07.complete.d: So the $(winter)Shadow Court$() was sealed in the end, by these $(spring)End Crystals$().$(n)They where scattered across the world....The enderman took the Elytra to their Shadow realm in $(winter)the End$().$(n)If we are to retrieve the Elytra we are to obtain all the End Crystals so we can open a portal to the End! Sound easy enough!
quest.feywild.summer.quest_07.start.desc: Did you $(spring)find$() any $(spring)information on the Shadow Court$()?$(n)What are you standing around for then? Go look! We need to succeed, or $(summer)Queen Titania$() will have our heads!$(n) - The pixie starts digging through a pile of books -$(n)'Productive Bees!'...This could be usefull, but it's not what we are here for!..'How to make farming a delight' ....Really? 'The mystical art of agriculture'....This must be the Spring or Autumn Pixie section! Blergh.
quest.feywild.summer.quest_08.complete.d: We did it! All twelve of them! I'm...beat...$(n)- The pixie rests on your head, her arms and legs dangling on the side- $(n)Let's find the nearest village!$(n)And order the biggest meal! My treat!..Why are you gasping?$(n)Stop it!..I just wanted to show you my gratitude!$(n)Well...for your friendship....we been through so much together....$(n)Would you stop it! Just accept my generosity! Hmph!$(n)- At the nearest village you and your pixie enjoy a delightfull meal -$(n)Aaaah! Im stuffed!$(n)Are you ready to face our final destination? Let's find the  $(summer)End Portal $() and face what ever is on the other side!
quest.feywild.summer.quest_08.start.desc: So the $(winter)Shadow Court$() was sealed in the end, by these $(spring)End Crystals$().$(n)They where scattered across the world....The enderman took the Elytra to their Shadow realm in $(winter)the End$().$(n)If we are to retrieve the Elytra we are to obtain all the End Crystals so we can open a portal to the End! Sound easy enough!
quest.feywild.summer.quest_09.complete.d: You...defeated him! You actually did it! - The pixie hugs you tightly -$(n)As promised...I'll tell you my name....$(n)-the pixie whispers her name in your ear-$(n)- You expected the contract to burn but instead it get's a new glow a different kind of magic-$(n)Since you are no longer bound to a contract....you are free to go...$(n)unless you want to stay and help me find the Elytra...?
quest.feywild.summer.quest_09.start.desc: A $(winter)dragon$()! It's a ender dragon!$(n) - The pixie hides behind you -$(n)Are you able to $(autumn)take it down$()?$(n)Please be careful! It's ok if we can't get the Elytra! We'll just be exiles forever!$(n)But...I rather spend eternity being hunted down, as long as it's together with you!$(n)- The pixie clings on to you sobbing -$(n)I'm sorry! I tricked you in making a contract and saying your name!$(n)I just wanted a champion for my own! I'm sorry!$(n)If we survive this, i'll tell you my name, and you won't be bound to me any longer! I promise!
quest.feywild.summer.quest_10.complete.d: We found it! We did it! Together, as friends!$(n)I didn't expect you would have stayed...w..why did you stay?$(n)What? -The pixie turns red and waves her arms around in panic- ...we're...friends?$(n)Friends huh....? -The pixie smiles happily -$(n)The Audacity! Friends! Hmph....you wish!?$(n)Thanks...friend. Let's go home?$(n)$(n)-You and your pixie friend return home, to the Summer Court. As you arrive at the Golden Seelie Fields and the World Tree, a horde of summer fey awaits your arrival. They cheer for the Summer Court's newest heroes -$(n)$(n)$(summer)- You kneel before Queen Titania, ready to be knighted and recieve your everlasting reward. A gift from Queen Titania...a Touch...You forget your mortal life, and embrace the touch of the Fey. You become one of the fey and join their Realm as their Champion. Their champion and as a friend -$()
quest.feywild.summer.quest_10.start.desc: You...defeated him! You actually did it! - The pixie hugs you tightly -$(n)As promised...I'll tell you my name....$(n)-the pixie whispers her name in your ear-$(n)- You expected the contract to burn but instead it get's a new glow a different kind of magic-$(n)Since you are no longer bound to a contract....you are free to go...$(n)unless you want to stay and help me find the Elytra...?
quest.feywild.summer.quest_11.complete.d: If you ever loose the teleportation orb. Come to me again with an Pixie Orb.
quest.feywild.summer.quest_11.start.desc: If you want to go to the Feywild, I know of a way. But it requires some dark magic. $(n)$(summer)Obtain an eye of ender and trap a fey inside it$(). The orb will subtract all the magic from the captured fey , reducing it to a mere pixie.$(n)I can use my own magic to emplify the eye's teleportation magic and bind it to the Feywild.
quest.feywild.summer.root.start.descript: How dare you summon me like I am some sort of magician's pet.$(n)You better know your place....hmph  I demand you tell me your name!$(n)$(n)$(b;summer)Accepting this quest will bind you to the Summer Court!$()
quest.feywild.summer.root.start.title: Welcome to the Summer court
quest.feywild.winter.quest_01.complete.d: You seem very efficient at collecting these...maybe I can assign you with a purpose after all.$(n)My intentions? aren't they clair?....your soul belongs to us...and thus you either provide us with more souls or we collect yours...$(n)But if you where to find an early demise, I can be your friend on the other side.$(n)Everything...has a silver lining...$(n)– The pixie says with a monotone voice –
quest.feywild.winter.quest_01.start.desc: Greetings mortal...Your arrival is as expected.$(n)– The pixie says with a monotone voice –$(n)Meaning?...Eventually you would have ended up in the $(winter)arms of Winter$() anyways, its inevitable.$(n)Now that you have stated your name, $(winter)your soul belongs to us$()...$(n)If you don't want us to collect your soul at this moment in time, you should prove your worth to us.$(n)I wouldn't want to overload your severly lacking mortal brain, so a simple task would surfice.$(n)How about you $(spring)provide$() us with $(winter)zombie flesh$(), eight to be precise.
quest.feywild.winter.quest_02.complete.d: You made one...Hurray!$(n)– The pixie says with a monotone voice and she throws grave dust in the air, it slowly dwindles around you –$(n)Ow Mortal...You shouldn't express so much fear...$(n)– The pixie pats you on the head – There, there, you have done well!!$(n)Your soul is safe with me! As long as you provide, ofcourse...$(n)I don't want you to be the next grave dust we celebrate an initiation with...
quest.feywild.winter.quest_02.start.desc: Now that your soul has been initiated into the Winter Court....$(n)We should celebrate...by $(spring)crafting$() your $(winter)soul reaper scythe$()...$(n)It's purpose? To locate and collect more lost souls...Every $(winter)Soul Reaper$() has one...
quest.feywild.winter.quest_03.complete.d: As our new Soul Reaper you better look the part! $(n)If you are of no value...$(winter)Queen Mab$() will take your soul prematurely!$(n)- The pixie crafts you a mask with the new zombie head -$(n)You look dreadful...Why can't you always look like this?$(n)I can almost tolerate your existence now...
quest.feywild.winter.quest_03.start.desc: Mortal...-the pixie sighs-...you seem to upset the undead, and they say I have bad social skills...$(n)Maybe if you looked less alive, they would tolerate you more..$(n)-The Pixie evaluates you for any vulnerable parts -$(n)You would prefer another way? Ok...$(n)$(spring)Procure a zombie's head$() and let's make you look more presentable...
quest.feywild.winter.quest_04.complete.d: You collected them all?...I am so...Impressed...$(n)I guess I made this for nothing...$(n)- The pixie made you a tome stone and dug a fresh grave -$(n)It does looks comfortable...I envy you, Mortal...it looks like a nice place to rest...$(n)-The pixie considers taking a nap on your grave-$(n)Here...take this!
quest.feywild.winter.quest_04.start.desc: -The pixie sighs- You're still alive?...Why do you keep persisting, Mortal.$(n)Thou as much as I would like to be your friend.$(n)Your presence in the mortal realm is required.$(n)Maybe we should postpone our friendship...$(n)and strengthen your soul by keeping it bound to this plane.$(n)So...why don't you $(spring)collect$() ten souls for me...I'll trade it for a totem of undying...
quest.feywild.winter.quest_05.complete.d: Thank you...$(n)-The pixie pets you on the head-$(n)You are a good being...$(n)Someone should mention that more often.$(n)$(n)$(winter)-End of Chapter 1-
quest.feywild.winter.quest_05.start.desc: This mortal realm is to hot...I prefer the cold embrace of death...$(n)If it's not to much of a inconvenience... could you $(winter)grow$() some $(winter)winter tree saplings$().$(n)...
quest.feywild.winter.quest_06.complete.d: Now that we are here...I owe you a explanation. $(n)Had the Summer Court claimed you before I did, you would have become their Champion!$(n)...I know right...such inconvenience, right?$(n)Luckily we beat them to it, and claimed your soul!$(n) Queen Mab is willing to return your soul, if we can claim the Elytra for the Winter Court!$(n) Seems like you are fulfilling your destiny after all...
quest.feywild.winter.quest_06.start.desc: Reaper! Something wonderful has happened...$(n)The $(winter)Shadow Court$() has returned and their $(winter)Enderman$() have stolen the $(summer)Elytra$()!$(n)You're confused...? Fine...i'll explain! -The pixie takes a deep cold breath- $(n)$(n)...No...to much inconvenience...let's seek out a Librarian!
quest.feywild.winter.quest_07.complete.d: ...pretty self explanatory....find crystals...open end portal...$(n)You are right it's to much effort$(n)Maybe we should go back to your comfortable grave?
quest.feywild.winter.quest_07.start.desc: ...any $(spring)information$()?$(n)I haven't been successful either... - The pixie starts digging through a pile of books -$(n)'Antique Atlas...so dusty...'Dragon Mounts'....that's an efficient way to meet an early demise!$(n) 'Creatures...and....Beasts'...what would define the one and what the other?$(n)-the pixie ponders and sighs-
quest.feywild.winter.quest_08.complete.d: And that's twelve...$(n)- The pixie rests on your head, her arms and legs dangling on its side- $(n)You are my final resting place, Mortal...Let's look for a place to have our last meal...my treat...
quest.feywild.winter.quest_08.start.desc: ...pretty self explanatory....find crystals...open end portal...$(n)You are right it's to much effort$(n)Maybe we should go back to your comfortable grave?
quest.feywild.winter.quest_09.complete.d: You...defeated him!...As promised...- The pixie whispers her name to you - be kind to me, Mortal.$(n)If we find the Elytra your soul will be your own again...
quest.feywild.winter.quest_09.start.desc: Your destiny awaits...You will face the End and your soul will be forever ours...$(n)But do not worry...I'll be your friend either way...Ready to meet your demise?$(n)I have grown quit fond of you, Mortal.$(n) -the Pixie says with a monotone voice- $(n)I'll be collecting your soul when it's time...See you on the other side...$(n)Ow you will die, I bet my name on it, mortal! It's your destiny...
quest.feywild.winter.quest_10.complete.d: We found it...and you are still alive...? I guess I server you now, Master...$(n)W-What? You consider me your friend and Im free to go?$(n) -The Pixie pats you on the head-$(n)I told you where a good being..."$(n)$(n)-You return the Elytra to Queen Mab, though uncertain of the consequences of this action, the Elytra is now in the hands of the Winter Court.$(n)Your freedom and life...It's yours now...$(n)But your stay with the pixie has made you grow accustomed to the presence of death...$(n)You embrace it now...and accept the touch of the Fey. You become one of them and leave your mortal life behind. A friend awaits you on the other side. You fly with her to the Frozen retreat, the Winter Court's new Soul Reaper.
quest.feywild.winter.quest_10.start.desc: You...defeated him!...As promised...- The pixie whispers her name to you - be kind to me, Mortal.$(n)If we find the Elytra your soul will be your own again...
quest.feywild.winter.quest_11.complete.d: If you ever loose the teleportation orb. Come to me again with an Pixie Orb.
quest.feywild.winter.quest_11.start.desc: If you want to go to the Feywild, I know of a way. But it requires some dark magic. $(n)$(winter)Obtain an eye of ender and trap a fey inside it$(). The orb will subtract all the magic from the captured fey , reducing it to a mere pixie.$(n)I can use my own magic to emplify the eye's teleportation magic and bind it to the Feywild.
quest.feywild.winter.root.start.descript: Such inconvenience...why did you summon me Mortal?$(n)This ordeal will most certainly lead to your premature demise.$(n)But then maybe we can be friends... Care to tell me your name?$(n)$(n)$(b;winter)Accepting this quest will bind you to the Winter Court!$()
quest.feywild.winter.root.start.title: Welcome to the Winter court
screen.feywild.opening_screen: $(b;spring)Welcome to the Feywild!$()$(n)A dream or a nightmare, you are uncertain. As you wake up you find yourself in the world of the mystical, the Feywild. Whilst crossing from another world or reality, you have forgotten where you are from.$(n)But you where drawn to the seasonal allure of this plane. The colours, the smell it reminds you of your favourite season:
spring_quest_pixie.feywild.summon_messag: Where Am I? Who are you? Are you tasty? Let's go on an adventure! You wanna play? I'm hungry...
summer_quest_pixie.feywild.summon_messag: How dare you summon me like I am some sort of magician's pet. You better know your place....hmph
winter_quest_pixie.feywild.summon_messag: Such inconvenience...why did you summon me Mortal? This ordeal will most certainly lead to your premature demise. But then maybe we can be friends...
